1123.content:
Tonight's Purge Tale follows the story of Alexis Harrington, age 24. Most days, Alexis is a normal college student with a normal family and... well, normal everything, really. And, like many normal people, she accompanies her girlfriend and family to their protective shelter every year during The Purge.

However, this year, she wants nothing more than to take part in the mass chaos; several months ago, she had heard a very rare case on the news that someone, outside of The Purge, had raped and murdered an innocent woman. This made Alexis grow curious. Though she wasn't the kind of woman who'd ever willingly take another person's life, Purge or no Purge, but her mind was filled with the wonder: What would it be like to rape someone?


So now, here she was, allowing herself to be locked inside a city of anarchy with god knows who else, ready to sate her sick curiosity.

Her heart beat as she heard alarms sound all across the city, and massive, thick steel walls rose around its border. A voice blared over the silence, announcing that as of that moment, The Purge was in effect, and every crime, even murder, was legal from now until sunrise.

And the normally innocent Alexis Harrington gave a wild grin of unbridled excitement as the sun went down, ready to partake in the lawless festivities.


Before continuing: Who does Alexis partake in this night of lust and rape with?
1123.title: Lesbian

14.title: Reader's Choices

info.brief_description: What happens during this night is all perfectly legal *Gift ponts for good chapters*
info.description:
The Purge has been around for quite some time, letting anyone to do their crimes without any legal repercussions, if they are commited during a specific night of the year.
Movies mostly center around murders, but now anything goes.

This interactive should center around sexual acts, all of which are legal during The Purge.
